trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Massapequa
There were no other sightings in Massapequa on or around September 22nd 2009
divs: Sighting Detailswent outside for a smoke. sounded like an earthquake, or maybe a large missle passing very high overhead. It def. wasn't any ordinary aircraft, perhaps something big taking one of the world leaders to PA, the craft was traveling south to North which is weird since PA is south. I'm never going to forget the roar, the very bright red flashing, it was def. different.
Summary: Bright red very high and very very loud.
